net.sitecore.android.sdk.widget
Interface ItemsBrowserFragment.ContentTreePositionListener

Enclosing class:
ItemsBrowserFragment
public static interface ItemsBrowserFragment.ContentTreePositionListener

Defines content tree position change callback methods.

Method Summary
 void onGoInside(ScItem item)
          Notifies that content tree position changed to descendant item.
 void onGoUp(ScItem item)
          Notifies that content tree position changed to ancestor item.
 void onInitialized(ScItem item)
          Notifies that content tree loaded using root item.
